StudentReviews.review: This course has extensive coverage of sequence to sequence and attention models and advanced deep learning architectures for sequences and NLP. The most difficult concepts are broken down and articulated well. Essential for every aspiring NLP expert. I also enjoyed the guided coding exercises, they really put everything together
StudentReviews.coursetaken: NLP - Natural Language Processing w/ Python

StudentReviews.review: Easy to understand and very straight forward
The mentor is cool, the way he conveys each material is also detailed and easy to reach.
StudentReviews.coursetaken: Learn Figma Essentials for UI UX Design(2022)

StudentReviews.review: I love the tutorial and was able to find many hidden elements which I was not aware of this. Thanks for the free course.
StudentReviews.coursetaken: UI Design: Make a Beautiful Website

StudentReviews.review: Very nice courses on what some covered
This course gave me a strong understanding of data structures and algorithms. The instructor’s examples were clear, and the real-world applications made it easier to grasp difficult concepts.
StudentReviews.coursetaken: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python

StudentReviews.review: The course was very practical and hands-on, which I loved. I was able to build a full-stack web application from scratch. The step-by-step guidance made complex topics approachable.
StudentReviews.coursetaken: Full Stack Web Development with JavaScript

StudentReviews.review: A fantastic course for anyone interested in deep learning! The lessons are structured so well that even complex topics are easy to follow. The best part is the projects that provide real-world experience.
StudentReviews.coursetaken: Deep Learning A-Z: Hands-On Artificial Neural Networks

StudentReviews.review: Very nice courses on what some covered

faqTitle.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqTitle.description: Still you have any questions? Contact our Team via hello@squareup.com

faqArray.question: Can I download course materials?
faqArray.answer: Yes, downloadable materials are available for most courses and can be accessed in the course dashboard.

faqArray.question: How do I reset my password?
faqArray.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on the 'Forgot Password' link. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

faqArray.question: Is there a mobile app available?
faqArray.answer: Yes, we have a mobile app available for both Android and iOS platforms. You can download it from the respective app stores.

faqArray.question: How do I get a course certificate?
faqArray.answer: To receive a course certificate, you must complete all required assignments and pass the final exam. The certificate will be available for download in your profile.

faqArray.question: What if I need help with the course content?
faqArray.answer: If you need help with the course content, you can reach out to our support team or join our community forums to get assistance from instructors and peers.

faqArray.question: Can I upgrade my subscription plan?
faqArray.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your subscription plan at any time from your account settings. The new plan will be effective immediately.

faqArray.question: Are there any discounts available?
faqArray.answer: We offer various discounts throughout the year. Keep an eye on our website and newsletters for the latest promotions and discounts.

faqArray.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqArray.answer: To cancel your subscription, go to your account settings and select 'Cancel Subscription.' Follow the prompts to complete the cancellation process.

whatyouget.headtitle3: You Get Full & Immediate Access To

whatyouget.description: Over 40 hours of step-by-step training covering EVERY aspect of building an agency, the best business model for beginners, from scratch. This is almost a plug & play system. Signing clients, running Facebook ads, building out your team, on-boarding clients, invoicing, sales. This program has everything covered for you.

Inside of 6-Figure Sales Rep, Paul is gonna teach you the best and most timeless high-income skill to go from zero to six figures in record time. He'll give you the same proven sales process that we use internally at all of my companies and that Paul has used to train hundreds of people from all walks of life and turn them into world class Remote Sales Rep.

Over 40 hours of step-by-step training covering EVERY aspect of building an agency, the best business model for beginners, from scratch. This is almost a plug & play system. Signing clients, running Facebook ads, building out your team, on-boarding clients, invoicing, sales. This program has everything covered for you.

gettoknow.headtitle: Get to know Dr. Enayat Modares more
gettoknow.headdescription: Hello, I am Inayat Modares - I came from poverty to the third university in the world, I worked with the United Nations, I was invited to the biggest world conferences, I changed the lives of thousands of people, tens of institutions andI founded a successful business, worked with the best national and international media, completed my medicine and master's degree in the most prestigious university in the world. At the moment, there are several online businesses and unique programs
gettoknow.headdescription2: I lead the other. Now I came here to honestly and sincerely share the knowledge, experiences and skills I have learned along the way, which can save you from the trap of poverty and fulfill your dreams. deliver
gettoknow.transformtitle: So far, I have transformed the lives of thousands of people
gettoknow.transformdescription: From poverty to the third best university in the world, from cooperation with the United Nations to being invited to the biggest world conferences, from working with the best national and international media to leading several institutions. and successful business, from practicing medicine to completing a master's degree, from building dozens of leading online businesses to changing the lives of thousands of people around the world. Now I came to you with the latest knowledge and Today's money making skills will equip you to achieve your dreams
gettoknow.featuredline: AS FEATURED IN - Associates of Dr. Modares

getajob.headtitle: Get a job and side income with 31 sessions in (two months).
getajob.descriptionpara1: In today's era and considering the current economic conditions, every person should have at least one online side job that can earn him hundreds of dollars daily in addition to his main job.
getajob.descriptionquestion2: Most people do not know where to start and how to start?
getajob.descriptionanswer: At Modars Academy, we teach you these skills from (A to Z) in a practical way
getajob.descriptionpara3: With us, learn 🎓 as much as a university 🏫 in 60 days and at the end of this course, create several sources of income that will earn you 100s of dollars 💵 a day. The money-making skills you learn in Modares Academy will generate income for you for the rest of your life, like a machine 🏧 money printing 💰
getajob.descriptionpara4: What you learn in these 60 days is being taught right now at Harvard, SciencePo, Stanford and MIT. We have worked for nearly two years on the development of this revolutionary program that will completely and forever change your view of money and wealth, poverty and freedom, and the complex rules of today's world.
getajob.descriptionparaknowthat1: Know that education and learning is always a long-term and valuable investment for you
getajob.descriptionparaknowthat2: Read the following carefully if you want to change your life forever
getajob.contentinfobox: The following content will be taught all at once in these 60 days📚The most complete educational package of the digital age 💻📷 The package that every person needs in today's era

Important.title: Important:
Important.title2: Read This Before Making Your Decision

Important.Carddescription: Think again. Overcome the reasons holding you back and take the leap toward a brighter future.
Before you make a decision, let me share why this course could be life-changing for you.

Important.Cardtitle: Is This Course Right for You?
Important.Carddescription: Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur or a professional looking to upskill, this course is designed for anyone ready to take their career to the next level.
If you've made it this far, you're already serious about improving yourself. Now, let’s dive in and make it happen.

participate.title: Why should I participate in Madras

participate.Carddescription: Learn the most valuable, real-world skills that generate income in today’s competitive marketplace. From entrepreneurship to digital marketing, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge to succeed.
Benefit from an education inspired by Harvard, Cambridge, and Stanford. Our program combines the academic rigor of top universities with practical, actionable insights.
Surround yourself with innovators and thinkers. Build lasting connections with experts and peers who are shaping the future.
Get the same in-depth education as a full university session, but in a condensed and efficient format. Our 60-day program is designed to give you maximum value in minimal time.

digitaleducation.headtitle: Unlock the Most Comprehensive Digital Education Package in Just 60 Days
digitaleducation.description: A complete program designed for success in today’s digital world.

Duration.title: Duration:
Duration.description: The course lasts for 62 days, with live classes conducted 5 days a week.

Class.title: Class Length
Class.description: Each session lasts for 1 hour, but may extend to 3-4 hours to ensure in-depth learning and optimal experience. There are a total of 31 sessions.

Class.title: Class Time
Class.description: Class timings will be decided after consulting with the participants, based on time zone differences to ensure global participation.

Class.title: Missed a Class?
Class.description: Don’t worry! All classes will be recorded and made available on the same day for you to catch up at your convenience.

Class.title: Practice Assignments
Class.description: After each class, you will receive assignments to practice and apply what you've learned. This ensures a hands-on approach to developing valuable money-making skills.

DonotJoinCourse.title: Who Should Not Join This Course?

DonotJoinCourse.listitem: Those who are content with a mediocre life and don’t aspire to achieve their dream lifestyle.
People who prefer to complain about their circumstances rather than make a real effort to change.
Individuals who don’t value learning new skills and see investing in education as a burden.
Those who are willing to work for others for the rest of their lives without seeking control and freedom over their time.
